org.openpnp.vision.pipeline

Class CvAbstractScalarParameterStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.vision.pipeline.CvStage
      • org.openpnp.vision.pipeline.CvAbstractParameterStage
        • org.openpnp.vision.pipeline.CvAbstractScalarParameterStage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterBool, ParameterNumeric

    public abstract class CvAbstractScalarParameterStage
extends CvAbstractParameterStage
    Abstracts a scalar parameter, typically set by a slider. The scalar is abstracted by an integer, so discrete/enumerated settings can also be modeled reliably.

    • Nested Class Summary
